title: Anyone drinking some of that delicious Bud Light?
body:
https://i.imgur.com/uwdPW0Z.png

Bud Light is the ultimate alcoholic beverage. If I go to a friend's house and they don't have some of that sweet, sweet Bud Light, it's the last time I'll be wasting my time hanging out with them. Bud Light tastes so good and it makes you feel good too. Today I heard Doublelift say the reason he played so well is because he smashed a 30 rack of Bud Light before the game.
